content:
To build and configure Service Catalog site pages, create and edit the following pages:

Create the Service Catalog Item Definition object page by selecting Object Pages, searching for Service Catalog Item Definition, and clicking Create.

Configure the Service Catalog Item Definition Detail object page variation by adding a Service Catalog Record Detail component, setting a custom success message, and configuring the Grid component within it.

Create the Network Data Category object page by selecting Object Pages, searching for Network Data Category, and clicking Create.

Configure the Network Data Category Detail object page variation by adding a Service Catalog Grid component, selecting the Self-Service List data source, and choosing the Service Catalog Item Definition object. Also, add a Data Category Path and Subcategories List component to display information on the page.

Note: The required layout of the components includes Service Catalog Record Detail, Service Catalog Grid, Data Category Path, and Subcategories List.
title: Configuring Service Catalog Site Pages
